issue.title: Hope to add development document
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Awesome project, great job :)
Anyway, is possible to add some useful documents for development

Thanks

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6?focusedCommentId=15900359) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
The various project components have README documents describing the development process

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6?focusedCommentId=17585992) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
